Posts.Content: angiebaby1 wrote: Hello ladies, I have 1 more round of chemo on the 24TH and then doctors appoinmemnts and test...surgery will be done on the 30TH of May. I am scared but excited at the same time just  to get past some more of this crazy journey.  I am already stressing about clthoes to wera after the surgery, camisoles...bras, prothetheses and all of that. I will be waiting 4to6 weeks after surgery toi strat  radiation, 5 dasy a week for 6 weeks....then I have to wait up to 14 monhts for my reconstruction surgery..... but i will be cancer free and should strat feeling like my a better version of my old self...eventually.  any suggestions regarding clothin for after the surgery would be helpfull and anything else you could pass on ...thank you  Angela Dx 11/17/2011, IBC, 6cm+, Stage IIIB, 0/3 nodes, PR-, HER2- Chemotherapy 1/11/2012 Cytoxan (cyclophosphamide), Taxotere (docetaxel) Surgery 5/30/2012 Lymph node removal: Left, Sentinel; Mastectomy: Left Radiation Therapy 7/9/2012 Breast Surgery 1/28/2013 Mastectomy: Right; Prophylactic mastectomy: Right; Reconstruction (left): DIEP flap; Reconstruction (right): DIEP flap Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: bilatreral mastectomy next month angiebaby1 Mooleen
